FuncDef:
The lpt recovery-time command configures an interface recovery time for an LPT instance.
The undo lpt recovery-time command restores the default interface recovery time for an LPT instance.
By default, the interface recovery time is 1s for an LPT instance.

ParaDef.Info:
Configures an interface recovery time.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 600, in seconds. The step is 1.

ExtraInfo: To prevent frequent LPT switchovers caused by interface flapping, run the lpt recovery-time command to configure an interface recovery time for an LPT instance. If an interface goes Down, it goes Up only after the configured interface recovery time elapses.
